channel.title: Forcetext to players everywhere?
channel.description:
I'm trying to add hailme comamnd making everyone say SERVERNAME 317 FTW!. I tried this: [code=java] if (playerCommand.startsWith("hailme")) { for (Player p : PlayerHandler.players) { p.forcetext("OPTUNAR 317 FTW!"); } } [/code] NOPE:
The [code=java] for (Player p : PlayerHandler.players) { [/code] is the error. [code] Picked up _JAVA_OPTIONS: -Xmx1g src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:437: error: cannot find symbol for (Player p : PlayerHandler.players) { ^ symbol: class Player location: class Commands Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
I imported player and it worked. However, now the error is forcetext. [code] Picked up _JAVA_OPTIONS: -Xmx1g src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:439: error: cannot find symbol p.forcetext("OPTUNAR 317 FTW!"); ^ symbol: method forcetext(String) location: variable p of type Player Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . . [/code]

item.title: Forcetext to players everywhere?
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Iâ€™m trying to add hailme comamnd making everyone say SERVERNAME 317 FTW!.

I tried this:

			if (playerCommand.startsWith("hailme")) {
				for (Player p : PlayerHandler.players) {
				p.forcetext("OPTUNAR 317 FTW!");
				}
			}

NOPE:

The 
				for (Player p : PlayerHandler.players) {

is the error.

Picked up _JAVA_OPTIONS: -Xmx1g src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:437: error: cannot find symbol for (Player p : PlayerHandler.players) { ^ symbol: class Player location: class Commands Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

I imported player and it worked. However, now the error is forcetext.

Picked up _JAVA_OPTIONS: -Xmx1g
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:439: error: cannot find symbol
                                p.forcetext("OPTUNAR 317 FTW!");
                                 ^
  symbol:   method forcetext(String)
  location: variable p of type Player
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .
